snippet: MTV Networks announced a new site, Artists.MTV, at the South by Southwest festival, with the goal of making it a central destination for online music, much the way MySpace once was.
abstract: MTV Networks announced a new site, Artists.MTV, at the South by Southwest festival, with the goal of making it a central destination for online music, much the way MySpace once was.

headline.main: Digital Notes: MTV.com Sees an Opening as MySpace Fades Away
